literals.EmptyLogin: Please input a correct email address.
literals.IncorrectLogin: Your email or password is incorrect. Please try again.
literals.OnlineModeWarning: The app is running online. Make sure you have a good connection.
literals.DownloadError: Error downloading content. Downloading will start again automatically in a few seconds...

literals.InactivityWarning: You have not used this application for a while. If you do not click below you will be automatically logged out.
literals.LoginCaption: Sign in with your ClarityEnglish account
literals.NotAnsweredQuestions: You have missed a question.|You have missed {count} questions.
literals.IncorrectQuestions: You need to answer all the questions correctly.
literals.DirtyExercise: Are you sure? You will lose all the work you have done in this exercise.
literals.UnreadExerciseFeedback: This exercise has feedback you haven't read. Do you want to read it?
literals.ClickAnswersForFeedback: Click on the answers to see feedback.
literals.CompareCaption: Compare your average score in a unit to everyone else's.
literals.ExerciseLoadError: A problem occurred while loading this exercise. A note has been sent to ClarityEnglish.
literals.NoProgress: Progress Report is only available to registered accounts. If you would like to check your progress, please create an account on the sign-in page.
literals.DisconnectedTimeoutReset: You have been disconnected from the internet for too long and have been automatically signed out.
literals.LicenceInvalidReset: Your licence has been dropped and you have been signed out. Please try again.
literals.InactivityTimeoutReset: You have been inactive for too long and have been automatically signed out.
literals.NetworkError: Unable to connect. Please check your Internet connection and try again.

literals.ExerciseLoadError: A problem occurred while loading this exercise. An error notification has been sent to ClarityEnglish.
